title: Kim
description: Explore India with Kim, a boy with both East and West in his soul...Orphan boy Kim is reared in the teeming, vibrant streets of India at the turn of the last century. An impish child with an endless interest in the extraordinary characters he meets, Kim is a 'Friend of all the World'. One day, an old Tibetan lama sets him on the path that will lead him to travel the Great Trunk Road, and become a spy for the British...
author: Rudyard Kipling
